column4: hi all! i have iBook G4 and i cannot get more then 1h when it runs on battery!i remember i've installed something in 7.10 once but cannot remember what :(!now i've tried everything i found(ACPI APM<powernow,cpudyn,pommed,pmud,laptop-mode tools,powertop....but no luck!!!any help? :(
is it posible that i must recompile kernel to get longer life for my battery?
no but it is posible that linux is just draining battery faster than windows. that's what my experience says.
yes but it was ok with last linux installation wich i had to delete for some reasons!!!
